import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { fetchDetay, fetchDuzenle } from '../api'; const Duzenle = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [data, setData] = useState({ baslik: "", ufakbaslik: "", acikla: "", aciklaiki: "", selectedFile: "", video: "", carousel: "", renk: "", film: "", top10: "", yeni: "" }) useEffect(() => { fetchDetay(id) }, [id]) const onInputChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const navigate = useNavigate(); const Duzenle = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); fetchDuzenle(`data,${id}`) navigate("/panel"); }; return ( <>
